charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1s)
CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Amended to reflect restitution ordered joint and several with co-defendant; otherwise, the judgment remains unchanged. Dft was found guilty by a jury of Counts 1 through 29 of a 30-count Second Superseding Indictment on January 11, 2019. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: 34 months on Counts 1, 2, and 9 through 29, concurrently with each other; and 24 months on Counts 3, 4, and 5, concurrent with each other and consecutively to Counts 1, 2, and 9 through 29. This is a total term of imprisonment of 58 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of: 3 years on Counts 1, 2, and 9 through 29; and 1 year on Counts 3, 4, and 5; all counts to run concurrently with each other. Mandatory, Standard and Special conditions imposed. MONETARY PENALTIES: It is ordered that the defendant shall pay to the United States, a special assessment of $100 on each of Counts 1 through 5 and 9 through 29, for a total of $2,600.00, which amount shall be due immediately. Since the Court finds that the defendant does not have the ability to pay a fine, the fine is waived. It is ordered that restitution of $576,937.75 is imposed. The preliminary order of forfeiture is finalized and imposed. Mandatory drug testing is waived, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 3583(d). Dft advised of right to appeal; allowed to self-surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons on Monday, October 7, 2019 at or before 2:00 p.m.

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Amended to reflect restitution to be joint and several with co-defendant - Sharif Karie - Case No. 4:17-cr-00014-01-BCW; otherwise, the J&;C remains unchanged. Dft pleaded guilty on September 10, 2018 to count 1 of a 30-count Second Superseding Indictment. Defense withdraws objection to P.S.I.R. Court grants governments motion Doc. #132. Counsel make sentencing recommendations; Dft addresses the Court. Dft sentenced to 3 years probation with mandatory, standard and special conditions imposed. Monetary Penalties: $100 MSA; Restitution: $536,833.75 joint and several. Preliminary order of forfeiture finalized; mandatory drug testing waived; dft advised of right to appeal.

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Count(s) 2 through 5 are dismissed on the motion of the United States; Counts 6 through 8 have been previously dismissed.
